title: Runtime Asset Patcher
description: Easily patch and update your DataAssets at runtime without repackaging. This plugin lets you fetch and apply asset modifications via HTTP or local file, with minimal setup required. Streamline your workflow and keep your projects up to date effortlessly.
longDescription:
Elevate your development workflow with our powerful Runtime Asset Patching plugin for Unreal Engine. This versatile tool allows you to patch and update assets in your game or application at runtime via HTTP or local files—without the need for repackaging or redeploying. Designed for seamless integration, the plugin works with both Blueprint and C++, requiring minimal configuration to get started.





Key Features:

  • Patch Assets via HTTP or Local Files: Dynamically update your assets from a remote server or local file system, enabling rapid iteration and testing without the hassle of rebuilding and repackaging your project.
  • Blueprint & C++ Support: Fully integrated with Unreal’s Blueprint and C++ environments, making it accessible to both technical and non-technical team members. Trigger patches, manage updates, and customize behavior easily within your project.
  • Streamline Your Workflow: Perfect for live service games, VR/AR applications, and enterprise solutions where content needs to be updated frequently. This plugin allows you to push updates or tweaks to your assets instantly, ensuring your users always have the latest content without interruption.
  • Minimal Setup, Maximum Flexibility: With straightforward configuration options, you can start applying patches with just a few clicks or lines of code. Whether you’re working on a small indie game or a large-scale enterprise project, this plugin adapts to your needs.
  • Supported asset property types: Primitive types (bool, uint8, uint16, uint32, uint64, int8, int16, int32, int64, float, double), FString, FName, FText (full support for patching localized text), UENUM, USTRUCT containing any supported types, TArray containing any supported types, TMap containing any supported types, TSet containing any supported types, TSoftObjectPtr, TWeakObjectPtr


Use Cases:

  • Live Game Updates: Modify gameplay parameters, swap out object references, or make other changes to data assets without requiring players to download a new version of your game.
  • Enterprise Applications: Quickly deploy content updates in training simulations, architectural visualizations, or interactive installations, ensuring your content is always current.
  • Rapid Iteration During Development: Test different asset configurations on the fly, speeding up the development process and reducing downtime caused by lengthy builds and deployments.


Empower your development pipeline with the flexibility to update assets in real-time. Say goodbye to lengthy repackaging processes and keep your projects fresh and up to date with ease.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Create JSON asset patches
  • Load asset patches via HTTP or local file
  • Apply, Revert, and otherwise manage patching of assets at runtime using C++ or Blueprint

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  •  RuntimeAssetPatcher (Runtime module used for downloading patches and patching assets)
  •  RuntimeAssetPatcherEditor (Editor module used for creating patches)

Number of Blueprints: 10+ new nodes

Number of C++ Classes: 10+

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: All Unreal Engine target platforms

Documentation: https://dualartegames.github.io/RuntimeAssetPatcher/

Example Projects: https://dualartegames.github.io/RuntimeAssetPatcher/#/quickstart
